# Varity - The Operating System for Web3

## Company Overview
Varity is building the complete Web3 operating system that replaces AWS, Google Cloud, and Azure with 100% decentralized infrastructure (DePin). We enable businesses to run ANY application on decentralized infrastructure with 64-80% cost savings and military-grade privacy guarantees.

## Core Product: Company-Specific AI Dashboards
Our flagship product is a turnkey company-specific AI dashboard that aggregates all business tools (QuickBooks, Salesforce, Monday.com, etc.) into one unified interface with an AI assistant trained on YOUR business data, not generic models.

## Key Features
- **5-Layer Privacy Architecture**: Provable security vs. "trust us" cloud models
- **Cost Savings**: 89% total savings including AI capabilities vs. Google Cloud Platform
- **Deployment Speed**: Deploy in 60 seconds from signup to live
- **Industry RAG Knowledge**: 10,000+ documents per industry for contextual AI responses
- **50+ Integrations**: Connect with Salesforce, HubSpot, QuickBooks, Stripe, and more

## Infrastructure Partners
- **Arbitrum L3**: Secure blockchain layer for smart contracts and settlement
- **Filecoin/IPFS**: Decentralized storage network via Pinata
- **Akash Network**: Decentralized compute for AI/LLM processing
- **Lit Protocol**: Wallet-based encryption for data privacy
- **Celestia**: Data availability layer with AnyTrust DA

## Pricing
- **Business Plan**: $99/month - 50GB storage, 1,000 AI queries
- **Business Pro Plan**: $199/month - 200GB storage, 2,000 AI queries
- **Enterprise Plan**: Custom pricing for unlimited usage

## Technology Stack
- **Blockchain**: Arbitrum L3 Rollup (Chain ID: 33529)
- **RPC URL**: https://rpc-varity-testnet-rroe52pwjp.t.conduit.xyz
- **Explorer**: https://explorer-varity-testnet-rroe52pwjp.t.conduit.xyz
- **Native Token**: Bridged USDC (6 decimals)
- **Smart Contracts**: 10+ deployed contracts for business logic

## Open Source SDK
We provide 12 SDK packages for developers to build on Varity:
- @varity/sdk - Main SDK entry point
- @varity/client-js - JavaScript/TypeScript client
- @varity/client-python - Python client library
- @varity/client-go - Go client library
- @varity/ui-kit - React component library
- @varity/migrate - Migration tools from AWS/GCP

## Generic Dashboard Template
Open-source template for building industry-specific AI dashboards:
- MIT licensed with "Powered by Varity" attribution
- Includes all 6 Conduit marketplace apps (Privy, thirdweb, Superbridge, Decent, Conduit Builder, USDC)
- One-command deployment: `varity deploy`
- Available at: https://github.com/varity/generic-company-dashboard

## Market Opportunity
- **Target Market**: 30 million SMBs globally
- **Year 1**: 100 merchants, $1.2M revenue
- **Year 2**: 1,000 merchants, $12M revenue
- **Year 3**: 10,000 merchants, $120M revenue
- **Infrastructure**: 5,000+ DePin nodes by Year 3

## Competitive Advantages
1. **First-mover in Web3 OS category** - Complete cloud replacement
2. **Structural cost advantage** - DePin economics provide 64-80% savings
3. **5-layer privacy architecture** - Mathematically provable security
4. **Intelligent multi-chain routing** - Auto-selects optimal blockchain
5. **Industry-specific templates** - Pre-built for finance, healthcare, retail, ISO merchants
